body_html:
@ethancaballero The dynamic_rnn_decoder_attention will not have beam search implented (yet!). Multi-layered decoder and beam search is first on my todo list.

When this PR has been merged I will update the two other PRs (sequence_loss and rnn_decoder) and make a new with the dynamic_rnn_decoder_attention where we can discuss extensions. By multi-hop attention are you referring to: m_i in (https://arxiv.org/abs/1506.07285)?
body_text:
@ethancaballero The dynamic_rnn_decoder_attention will not have beam search implented (yet!). Multi-layered decoder and beam search is first on my todo list.
When this PR has been merged I will update the two other PRs (sequence_loss and rnn_decoder) and make a new with the dynamic_rnn_decoder_attention where we can discuss extensions. By multi-hop attention are you referring to: m_i in (https://arxiv.org/abs/1506.07285)?
body:
@ethancaballero The `dynamic_rnn_decoder_attention` will not have beam search implented (yet!). Multi-layered decoder and beam search is first on my todo list.

When this PR has been merged I will update the two other PRs (`sequence_loss` and `rnn_decoder`) and make a new with the `dynamic_rnn_decoder_attention` where we can discuss extensions. By multi-hop attention are you referring to: m_i in (https://arxiv.org/abs/1506.07285)?
